import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Identity Provider"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/users/me/providers/{provider}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete an identity provider from the connected identity providers of the current user.

### Requirements
- You are not allowed to delete the password identity or the only existing identity.

A [security alert](../../docs/guides/auth/security-alerts#oauth2-specific-alerts)
will be sent to the user's email if this setting is enabled and
email is [enabled and configured correctly](../../docs/guides/email/configuration).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token) is required.
- A valid [`StepUpToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#step-up-token)
  is required. This token should match user and session contained in the `AccessToken`.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
